title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-1.4 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-1.4 - Penalties

State Regulations
A violation of any provision of this Part is subject to all civil and criminal penalties as provided for by law. For purposes of civil penalties, each packet, individual container or other separate unit of synthetic phenethylamine or synthetic cannabinoid, or product containing the same, that is possessed, manufactured, distributed, sold, or offered for sale, shall constitute a separate violation under this Part.
